rukus.text: han jilmunjaga iss-eul eungbeol-e gwanhayeo jilmunhayeossnani
geugeos-eun amudo jejihal su eobs neun bulsinjadeul-eul wihan eungbeol-e gwanhan geos-eulo
seungcheon-ui gil ui junim hananim-eu lobuteoui eungbeol-ila
omannyeongwado gat-eun halu dong-an-echeonsadeulgwa gabeuliel cheonsaga geubun kkelo eullaganila
geuleomeulo geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
sillo geudeul-eun geugeos-i meolli iss da saeng-gaghago issnola
geuleona hananim-eun geugeos-i gakka i iss-eum-eul algo gyesinila
geunal-eneun haneul-i yonghaedoen guli cheoleom doel geos-imyeo
sandeul-i yangteolcheoleom doel geos-imyeo
chinguga chinguui anbuleul mul-eul su eobs-eumyeo
bilog geudeul-i seologa seololeul andahayeodo geuleohal geos-imyeo joein deul-eun geunal-ui eungbeol-eul pihagi wiha yeo geuui jason-ina
geuui anaewa hyeongjena
geuleul bohohan chincheog-ina
daejie issneun modeun geos-eul bachyeogeu eungbeol-eul pihalyeo hadoda
geuleona gyeolko geuleohge doel su eobs-eumyeo buljiog-i iss-eul ppun-eulo
meolibuteo bultaewojigo
oemyeonhago geoyeoghaessdeon jadeul-eul buleumyeo
jaemul-eul chugjeoghayeo gamchueossdeon jadeul-eul buleunila
sillo ingan-eun changjodoeeoss-eudoe chimchaghaji moshago
jaeang-i ileul ttaemyeon keuge seulpeo hamyeo
haeng-un-i chaj-adeul ttaeneun insaeghae hadeola
geuleona yebaee chungsilhan jadeul eun geuleohji anihani
hangsang yebaehaneun geudeul-ila
geudeul-ui jaemul-eun jeongdanghan geos-eulo
guhaneun jadeul-ina guhaji a nihan jadeul-eul wihae sayonghago
simpan-ui nal-ui jinlileul bad-eudeul imyeo
junim-ui eungbeol-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul-ila
sillo hananim-ui eungbeol-eun bulga pihan geos-idoe
sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-eun je-oe la
geuleona anaedeulgwa geudeul-ui o leun son-i soyuhan jadeul-eun heolagdoen geos-idoe
geuleona ileul wibanhan geos-eun bul-uihan jadeul-ila
sin-yong-eul jikigo yagsog-eul ihaeng haneun jadeulgwa
jeung-eon-eul ham-e jeongjighan jadeulgwa
yebaesaenghwal-e chungsilhan jadeul-eun
chugbogbad-eun cheongug-e issge doelila
